text:
A total of 196 direct purchase centres has been opened in Nagapattinam district and more centres will be opened based on demand in specific areas, Collector S. Palanisamy said here on Tuesday.

Speaking after inspecting a DPC at Pazhayapalayam in Kollidam Panchayat Union, he urged farmers to sell their samba and thalady produce in the DPCs as the price was remunerative. If necessary, 96 more DPCs would be opened in various parts of the district through the Tamil Nadu Civil Supplies Corporation.

Sirkali MLA M. Sakthi and Kollidam Pachayat Union Chairperson R. Meena were present.
title: More DPCs to be opened
